import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FoodService } from 'src/app/service/food.service'; import { Food } from 'src/app/sheard/models/food'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit{ foods:Food[] = [] constructor(private foodService:FoodService){ this.foods = foodService.getAll() } ngOnInit() { } }
